title: findIndex
description: finds the index of the first item in an array of items with its nested property set to the value to find

rows: function findIndex(items: T[], valueToFind: T): number,
function findIndex(items: T[], valueToFind: any, property?: string): number

rows.name: items
rows.description: items to search through for the value

rows.name: property
rows.description: property to look at when searching to the value to find
